website_summaries.verdict: An aesthetically pleasing, sturdy wood table that's built as excellently as it looks.
pros: We found the Outdoor Interiors table to be the most visually appealing
If properly taken care of, the wood will hold up for years outside
Just the right size to put your feet up after a long day
We also thought the color of the wood looked beautiful outdoors, and fits in well if you already have wooden patio furniture
cons: Sits at a slightly higher price point than some of its wicker competitors

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Table is beautiful but it is literally falling apart. I have it on my pool deck just sitting there as a piece of furniture under cover. There is nothing on it. I can't even remember sitting a glass on it yet, the slots are falling out. I just stood there a few minutes ago wondering wt???? Did I get a counterfeit table?
customer_reviews.author: Nmaryland

customer_reviews.title: Matched perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I know it must seem awful to paint good wood, but I needed a small table to go with our other teak furniture. It would have cost a fortune to refinish it, so we painted it black. This little table was the perfect match and looks great with the set painted glossy black. Now it's easy to clean with just a damp cloth!
customer_reviews.author: GKideas

customer_reviews.title: cute small outdoor coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I liked that its small as we don't have much of a summer here, I will set it under the eves for winter. its easy to put the legs on and your good to go. really cute, and will be a good place to set a small plant and drinks. I've put a coat of teak oil to help protect it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Legs don't fit well.  Wobble.
customer_reviews.text: The leg support system on this table is rather unique. The legs slide through the 45 degree ends of the braces under the table and are bolted tight to a wood receiver. If everything was milled perfect this would work fine. Mine was not. So the legs wobble between the 2 mitered braces that are a bit too far apart to hold the legs tight. Nice table except it has weak, wobbly legs.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: This table is awesome. It went together very easily
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome. It went together very easily. I used Teak oil, brushed it on and wiped it with a cotton cloth. After about an hour, I oiled it again, and it looks beautiful. The rain just beads up and rolls right off of it. I am impressed with the quality of this table. It was a replacement for a much more expensive table that fell apart after one year, and I get more compliments on this table than on any other one I've had. And the price!!! Can't beat it!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Robinia

customer_reviews.title: Takes a few minutes to assemble it, and we’ll worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy, fast assembly, and is a sturdy piece of furniture. Very pleased with the quality of this table, and bought to matching end tables to go with it. Has a nice, even stain on it, and is very well made. All the screw holes lined up perfectly. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: they look great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an all wood piece that would stand up to years of exposure to sun and the elements on the back deck that didn't cost a fortune - this eucalyptus wood fit the bill perfectly. I bought both this coffee table and the end table. These are not as dark as pictured, so instead of oiling them right away [as recommended], I put on 2 coats of a dark stain and then gave them a coat of urethane (that should not require regular annual re-treating with an oil). The style and [now] dark finish matches my other outdoor furniture perfectly; they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Scott M. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I just built a pergola and put a floor on it. I bought two of these and am very happy. They are light weight and sturdy not counting how gorgeous they look. You’ll need to linseed them up.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have ditched the plastic / glass end tables on the deck and use this like a coffee table on deck in our sitting area. A great product. Just so pretty, truly
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E.

customer_reviews.title: Table had a 7" splinter in one of the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Table had a 7" splinter in one of the top slats, had to send it back. Otherwise it seemed lighter in color than the rest of my eucalyptus furniture. Maybe because it had never been oiled. otherwise an ok table.
customer_reviews.author: Mola Mola

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly legs with improper hardware!
customer_reviews.text: Just put together my table. It is pretty, but the legs are wobbly. I doubt the screw bolts won't stay fastened for very long. I am trying to figure out why this wasn't corrected after all the reviews commenting on this. It was too expensive for this to be an issue. So disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonomous

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. It’s tempting for a kid to sit on - not meant for much weight. Nice height.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Brockhoff

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last more than one year
customer_reviews.text: Got wobbly and dull looking after just one summer. :(
customer_reviews.author: ahatcher14

customer_reviews.title: I like the table and it went together easily however
customer_reviews.text: I like the table and it went together easily however, the top corner now has a split - the wood has separated - probably due to moisture getting into a small crack. Overall, for the price it's a good deal but I'm a little disappointed that it has had this problem after just 3-4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: nice table
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table with the Strathwood All-Weather bench and pair of chairs. While the style matches the set, the wood is slightly different and as such the color is off just a bit. To be fair, it is not from the same manufacturer so the fact that it matches as good as it does is really nice. We expect that over time the weather will fade it to match the set but even with that, the quality and overall look of the pieces together is very nice. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Jana M. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Just as nice as the picture shows.
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what I was looking for. Got 2 matching end tables too and they’re really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: South Park

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table for outdooor use. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy table for outdoor use on my balcony. I use it for my bonsai plants, but it would be useful for general patio use. Looks really nice when oil is applied, Easy to assemble; took just a few minutes with the tools provided.
customer_reviews.author: JAPenn

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table!
customer_reviews.text: We got one last year and used it on our deck. In the winter we put it in our sun porch. We liked this table so much we decided to get another one so we could have one both inside and out!
customer_reviews.author: penny hersey

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This table is appealing to look at and will be suitable for what it is intended for. It was very simple to assemble, however one of the leg holes was way off. Luckily, I was able to have another hole drilled and then it fit in perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: evnstvn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This table replaced a similar item destroyed in a hail storm and coordinates well with my other outdoor furniture. It was easy to assemble and is very nice looking for the price. You have to apply two coats of linseed oil or stain before using it outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: MS2704

customer_reviews.title: ... product over a year ago and it still in good shape. However
customer_reviews.text: Brought this product over a year ago and it still in good shape. However, i left it outside so i had to buy stainer to bring back the shine. It was like brand new again.
customer_reviews.author: OA Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor table.
customer_reviews.text: A very pretty coffee table. We love it. It's used outdoors and gets prettier every day. Would be excellent indoors too.
customer_reviews.author: Anycc

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding table for patio.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition and very easy to assemble with wrench. Just the right length for patio use. Well made and great price. Goes well with their folding tables too.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: This table looks like a far more expensive one - It's sturdy, good looking and a perfect fit for our patio. I did use Watco's black walnut oil to darken it which it did just slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: I sealed it with linseed oil which helps. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I sealed it with linseed oil which helps. It serves its purpose however the javalinas were still able to pull plants in their pots off of it! I've had to move it to the back patio which is fenced.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelmina

customer_reviews.title: Always check size!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, Nice color, Easy Assembly. Table is not a big as I thought, but i should've known to check. Check the size before you buy. It is as big as a coffee table. Oops.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks fantastic with my chairs that ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks fantastic with my chairs that I purchased from another vendor. I would buy more of this product line.
customer_reviews.author: TrixieMaxxCloset

customer_reviews.title: Attractive wood coffee table at very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the table yet, because waiting for the oil before putting it in sight of weather, but it looks great. It's just as nice as it looked.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful wood---looks a lot more expensive than it was----took minutes to assemble----wine glasses do not tip---very even surface
customer_reviews.author: rac

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table with the Strathwood All-Weather bench and pair of chairs. While the style matches the set, the wood is slightly different and as such the color is off just a bit, but still looks nice in our balcony.Table assembles easily. Good quality and style.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Patricia Tafur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough to sit on, and durable enough to leave outside during the (admittedly mild) California winters
customer_reviews.author: Katy DiNatale

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to measure furniture. When I opened the box last night, I was surprised @ how small it was. I haven't assembled it but the weight is very light. The quality seems good. I'm waiting on the rest of my furniture to put this on my patio. I like the product & will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OS2

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed with the construction quality and ease ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the construction quality and ease of assembly on this unit. I put it together in 5 minutes, and that's only because I had to go downstairs for a wrench. This was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: RBatto

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality at affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal furniture, incredible quality for the price! Easy to assemble, easy to maintain with linseed oil, great piece with a mid-century vibe. Made of real wood, not cork board with veneering.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembling! I oiled it before used and the wood showed beautifully. It's the perfect size to go with our wicker sofa set.
customer_reviews.author: Kinna

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Table is as advertised. We are using it outdoors, poolside. Assembly was easy and appearance is serviceable.
customer_reviews.author: GaylordM

customer_reviews.title: good table for the price
customer_reviews.text: the table arrived super fast and was easy to assemble. It is smaller than I thought (even though they clearly give accurate dimensions) but will suit our needs for both a table and ottoman this summer
customer_reviews.author: SJD

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with our purchase of the bench
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our purchase of the bench, chair and table, needless to say we are enjoying them now but they will be even more enjoyable here in Florida when it cools down some. We're very happy all three!
customer_reviews.author: MarrGax

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: This product looks and feels exactly like the photo. The product arrived in just a few days, with no damages and was very easy to put together. This table gives a comfortable, but classy feel to our back covered patio.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic table. Perfect size. Measure to fit your space but for mine it was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful finish and relatively sturdy table. Had difficulty with one screw which stripped when was tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Joann A.

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table but does not match the Strathwood chairs and bench
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to go with the Strathwood chairs and bench and a chaise lounge. It looks great but the finish/stain is darker than the Strathwood. It is however a great looking table...
customer_reviews.author: AnnF

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The table was a bit darker than the image online, but overall I was satisfied with purchase. After treating with feed and wax the wood color really came out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: I needed to find something that would go with a all weather wicker set that I have out on a screened porch. I couldn't match the color of the wicker, and I think the wood is much more solid. It was easy to put together. I did put Linseed oil on it before I used it. It seems very well made. Very sturdy. I have received several compliments on how nice it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy, easy to assembly, and very nice looking product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful and well built. Much lighter weight and a little lighter color than teak
customer_reviews.author: JOHN T.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: packaged well = easy to assemble - beats the price of teak and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.Grashuis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great table for a great price. I looked at a lot of tables and chose this mainly for its size and price and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the table we were hoping for. Size, material, workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Coker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table! It was very easy to assemble, and it looks great with our existing patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor table.
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor table. Just as pictured. Easy to put together and we've had it for a few months now and it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Altwer

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and solid. Easy to assembled and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly and looks
customer_reviews.text: only had it a week. easy assembly and looks good
customer_reviews.author: roger sjodin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Seems to be good quality. The only downside is I may have preferred a slightly darker finish.
customer_reviews.author: T & J

customer_reviews.title: It's one of the first blind purchased products like this I've really been happy with
customer_reviews.text: Well built and very attractive. It's one of the first blind purchased products like this I've really been happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and easy to put together. Did this in five minutes. Looks great with the conversation set of chairs I have outside on our deck. Nicely priced.
customer_reviews.author: lizjam

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy and matches a bench I bought separately just perfectly. It's really a cute little coffee table - love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: A table is a table is a good table
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, the right size, good looking, well finished, easy to assemble. What more can one say? A good serviceable piece, well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Brownstein

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous table and great deal. I just wish the oil required to treat the table was included.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: this is a really nice quality table
customer_reviews.text: Considering the budget price, this is a really nice quality table. The packaging was good and assembly super easy, just bolt four legs on. The finished item is strong and stable, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: GN Douglas

product_meta.title: Outdoor Interiors 390070 Eucalyptus Coffee Table
product_meta.description: Outdoor Interiors' mission is guided by providing innovative, space-saving designs using beautiful, sustainable hardwoods along with an exciting array of mixed materials. Utilizing high quality hardwoods, our unique styles and durability will make your patio the envy of the neighborhood. Eucalyptus is one of the fastest growing, dense Hardwoods prized for its strength, durability and weathering characteristics in all climates. Eucalyptus is naturally resistant to decay with handsome pinkish-brown tones and a straight, light wood grain similar to Teak. Eucalyptus will weather to a silvery finish over time unless treated 2-3 times a year with outdoor furniture oil. We recommend using a natural Linseed Oil or any Outdoor Hardwood or Teak oil for our Eucalyptus Furniture. The hardwood we use are plantation grown and very dense, with a luxurious straight grain and high oil content, similar to teak. It’s excellent for outdoor furniture because of its strength, rich appearance and durability. We also recommend using furniture covers during the winter months in harsher climate zones. Outdoor Interiors is a FSC Certified manufacturer providing only plantation grown eucalyptus from well managed forests. All hardwood follows the C.O.C. Chain of Custody for managing timber from our forests through production to our factory. This stylish coffee table will find a home instantly on your deck or patio. Beautiful coffee table is made of durable Eucalyptus. Looks and performs like teak. Easily maintained with a once annual oil treatment. Wood is easily maintained with a once annual oil treatment.
feature_bullets: Perfect for your patio or garden
Easily maintained with hardwood oil (sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars82 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
